item.title: About
item.description:
Bill Guo

  • 邮箱：billguocs#gmail.com
  • 技能：Java Spring Javascript Python Go
  • 简介：全栈工程师，文史爱好者，终生学习践行者，常有三分热度，并无十分成果

item.title: Links
item.description: <!-- To use this feature, add `links` section to frontmatter. This page's frontmatter: ```yaml links: - title: GitHub description: GitHub is the world's largest software development platform. website: https://github.com image: https://github.githubassets.com/images/modules/logos_page/GitHub-Mark.png ``` `image` field accepts both local and external images. -->
